title: Unable to use usb C to 3.5 mm adapter to make calls
content: Hi there, I have apple wired earphones and i tried to use my earphones with usb c adapter to make calls and listening music. Listening music is working well but it is not working while making calls however there is no headphone sign showing on top portion of phone screen. This is not good i want to use my old earphones i have bunch of wired earphones. Please help
